port.title: Port
port.description: Port on which to listen for incoming data

shared-key.title: Shared Key
shared-key.description: Shared key for authentication between fluentd and a fluentd/fluentbit data source

wendelin-frontend-url.title: Wendelin frontend URL
wendelin-frontend-url.description: URL of the Wendelin Telecom instance to which the data is to be forwarded

username.title: The username of a valid account to authenticate with on the Wendelin instance

password.title: The password of the account to authenticate with on the Wendelin instance
